data.generators

Class GaussianMislabeledDataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.generators.GaussianMislabeledDataGenerator

  • public class GaussianMislabeledDataGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class generates a certain number of mislabeled data instances according to the underlying model.

        Parameters:
        numClusters - Number of clusters to generate.
